during_work: Work only in your assigned branch
before_pushing: Use pull requests, not direct push

emergency_procedures.coordination_failure: Update status in this file and escalate to user
emergency_procedures.merge_conflicts: Stop work, coordinate via user, resolve manually
emergency_procedures.critical_bugs: Create hotfix branch, coordinate immediate fix
